profiles:
Experience Senior Design Automation Engineer Intel Corporation October 2013  – Present (1 year 11 months) Penang, Malaysia Responsibilities: 
 
•	Develop analog routing constraints tools. 
•	Develop analog based layout routing tools. 
•	Develop custom layout design tools. 
•	Develop custom layout stream-out & conversion tools. 
 
Accomplishments:  
 
•	Horizontal movement in role & responsibilities from physical layout verification into physical layout design tools development domain. 
•	Enhanced grasp of VLSI layout design's design automation in both design enablement & verification domain. Senior Design Automation Engineer Altera November 2008  –  October 2013  (5 years) Penang, Malaysia Responsibilities: 
•	Develop and define VLSI layout design and Physical Verification methodology and flows for Layout Verification including DRC and LVS. 
•	Develop and maintain verification tools/programs for layout design verifications, and design automation tools to ease designer’s effort. 
•	Provide solution and support to layout design group in terms of fixing complicated design rule violations.  
•	Evaluate new software solutions provided by external vendors and communicate on software bugs discovered and fixes needed. 
 
 
Accomplishments: 
•	Experienced in overall LV methodologies.  
•	14nm test chip sole engineer for Layout Verification setup, development & support.  
•	Accomplished experience in 14nm, 20nm, 28nm and 45nm Physical Verification Domain. 
•	Define and develop novel antenna ratio matching check for matched transistor, to ensure matching performance. This is also the basis for Master degree’s research dissertation.
